author: Staff Reporter
text:
The body of B. Parithi Semmal, a final year MBBS student of Sree Moogambika Institute of Medical Sciences in Kulasekaram, Kanyakumari district, who allegedly committed suicide at his hostel room on Wednesday, was handed over to his parents after post-mortem here on Thursday afternoon.

Videographed

The post-mortem was videographed on the request of the police department.

Meanwhile, the father of the deceased, P. Balakrishnan of Lalgudi in Tiruchi district, submitted a petition to Collector Sajjansingh R. Chavan on Thursday demanding an enquiry as he suspected foul play in his son’s death.
title: Medical student’s body handed over to parents
